mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, content, image_url, video_url, username, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{videoUrl}, #{username}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
